title: The Essential Teddy Pendergrass (2007) 2-CD Anthology
description:
In 1970, Teddy Pendergrass moved from the drum stool to the mic in Harold Melvin & the Blue Notes - and a new soul star was born.
 
Ã¢â‚¬Å“The EssentialÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, a 2-CD, 150-minute anthology of his smashes, is a meticulously selected and assembled collection of the R&B singer's best material covering all Pendergrass's biggest hits from both his early Philadelphia International tenure and his later stint at Elektra.

The Essential Teddy Pendergrass
